text: Vítor Machado Ferreira (born 13 February 2000), also known as Vitinha, is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for club Wolverhampton Wanderers, on loan from Porto, and the Portugal national under-21 team. ==Club career== Vitinha made his LigaPro debut for Porto B on 11 August 2019 in a game against Sporting Covilhã. On 28 January 2020, he made his first appearance for Porto's first team, coming on as a substitute for Wilson Manafá in the 61st minute in a match against Gil Vicente. He made a total of 8 substitute appearances for the team as they won the league title. On 9 September 2020, he moved on a season-long loan to English Premier League club Wolverhampton Wanderers. The club holds the option to make the loan into permanent deal at its conclusion. Vitinha made his debut for Wolves on 14 September 2020 in a Premier League game away to Sheffield United as a second- half substitute.
